name: Chimeric Sphere
originalText:
o2: Until end of turn, Chimeric Sphere is a 2/1 artifact creature with flying.
o2: Until end of turn, Chimeric Sphere is a 3/2 artifact creature without flying.

rulings.text: If the first ability is activated and resolves, then the second ability is activated and resolves, Chimeric Sphere will be a 3/2 creature. It won’t have flying.

A noncreature permanent that turns into a creature can attack, and its {T} abilities can be activated, only if its controller has continuously controlled that permanent since the beginning of their most recent turn. It doesn’t matter how long the permanent has been a creature.

text:
{2}: Until end of turn, Chimeric Sphere becomes a 2/1 Construct artifact creature with flying.
{2}: Until end of turn, Chimeric Sphere becomes a 3/2 Construct artifact creature and loses flying.
